Yeah pretty much anyone that explodes, they're jerks.
Love, Faith, forgiveness; in that order.

* They do worry about the market a bit, because they still have the scar of earthbound sales which they consider a failure.
* Yes they have tons of English fan support from USA to Euro to everywhere else but Nintendo tends to ignore fans and stick to "What's best based on Company statistics and advisors"
* The game would have to be edited a ton, based on the family oriented image Nintendo likes to keep here in the US. [Just look at the looooong list of changes they had to make for earthbound.](http://legendsoflocalization.com/earthbound/) If they were planning on ever releasing it to the US then Itoi would probably have had to write the story differently, and i'm pretty sure he would have been highly against that, being the last game n all...
There's so many more reasons; yeah Nintendo could just do it if they wanted to, but that's not the Nintendo style.
Sorry to sound like a Nintendo-hater, it is my favorite series of games ever.
Why on a subtank though...
Language isn't the issue for bringing Mother 3 to the US.

Host loads previously made bots of all players into an arena, host does all physics processing and essentially sends visual data to clients game.
Any toggled effects(movement,pistons,etc) would have to be automated. They wouldn't work well with any amount of delay.
This can be done, I've worked with unity.

In my experience most flavors tasted awful, I would just order from random sites. You have to go out and sample flavors at stores to see what you like. Or literally check all the reviews on a particular juice that interests you for anything under 4 stars...
and yes there is a chance that there will be **nothing** you like in that shop, but thankfully there are thousands of different juices.

These things used to be a pain in the ass to me when i started out, here's some things that could be causing that:
-The rubber gromet at the bottom of the coil head is burned
-The juice is not getting to your coil fast enough because it's getting clogged in the entry hole (too much wick)
-coil is old and burned
-not enough airflow?
-Juice is too thick(high vg)
Yeah you're right, you're just gonna wanna stick to the higher gauge coils so it doesn't take forever to heat up. Like 28-30 gauge.
